price: 75. (Alle) wuxuu yidhi: Ibliisow! Maxaa kuu diiday inaad salaan qaadasho ahaan ugu sujuuddo (macnaha rukuucdo) mid aan ku abuuray labadeyda Gacmood, miyaad isla weyn tahay, mise waxaad ka mid tahay kuwa isla sarreeya?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
